submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        N = len(nums)
        H = N // 2
        INF = 10 ** 20
        
        f = collections.Counter()
        f2 = collections.Counter()
        for i in range(H):
            f[abs(nums[i] - nums[N - i - 1])] += 1
            f2[max(max(nums[i], k - nums[i]), max(nums[N - i - 1], k - nums[N - i - 1]))] += 1
        
        best = INF
        extra = 0
        for i in range(k + 1):
            if i - 1 >= 0:
                extra += f2[i - 1]
            best = min(best, extra + (H - f[i]))
        return best
